input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
The heavyweight champ of our tailored tee shirt lineup, The Organic Cotton Shop Tee is crafted from a burly organic cotton jersey with a subtle ribbed finish for increased stretch and comfort. Built to stand up to the most demanding of days, this one stays on hand all year long and gets better with every wear.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton V-Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Hemp Blend Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Womens Sunwashed Crew Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Short Sleeve Vintage Chambray Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Sunwashed Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Graphic T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Core Pima Cotton Pocket Crew T-shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Air Slub Long Sleeve Cotton Blend T-Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Pima Cotton Pocket Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Bombas Pima Cotton Pocket Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Bombas Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Short Sleeve Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Premium-Weight Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Premium-weight Crew Neck T Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Crew T-shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Polo T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane x Parks Project Essential Organic Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Polo T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Henley'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Crew T-shirt'
  - Name='Kotn Men's Marshmallow Half Zip Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Premium-Weight Pocket T-Shirt'
  - Name='Outerknown Sojourn Pocket Tee'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton V-Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar basic t-shirt construction and cotton fabric, but differs in neckline (V-neck) and potentially fabric weight and finish.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Hemp Blend Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve t-shirt made with hemp blend, likely different feel and stretch compared to heavyweight organic cotton jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar short-sleeve cotton t-shirt with a pocket, possibly similar weight but may differ in fabric finish and possible sunwashed effect.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Close in being a cotton-based short-sleeve t-shirt, but sunwashed finish differs from heavyweight organic cotton jersey with ribbing and stretch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Womens Sunwashed Crew Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Womenâ€™s short-sleeve cotton tee, likely lighter weight and different fit; shares cotton material but less similar in construction and target.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Short Sleeve Vintage Chambray Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Vintage chambray fabric is different in texture and structure from heavyweight organic cotton jersey tee.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar cotton short-sleeve t-shirt with pocket, likely comparable but with different fabric finish and weight.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton short-sleeve t-shirt with graphics, similar construction but differences in finish and embellishment.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton crew neck pocket tee with high quality Pima cotton but may differ in weight and stretch compared to heavyweight organic cotton jersey.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crew neck cotton pocket t-shirt, similar general style but likely lighter fabric and no ribbed stretch construction mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Bombas Pima Cotton Pocket Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above, similar construction and material but lighter fabric and no ribbed finish described.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Men's Short Sleeve Crew Neck T-Shirt
